              <title><![CDATA[‘Gaps remain’ in Irish language deal]]></title>

                                            <description><![CDATA[Irish language organisation Conradh na Gaelige has said the rumoured deal between the DUP and Sinn Fein contained “essential elements” for legislation to protect Irish, but added that “gaps remained” in the package.]]></description>
